Pre-Game Insights: Colombia have also won their opening game at four straight Copa America tournaments, their longest such streak since 1983 to 1993.
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia look like the real deal, nine wins on the bounce for Colombia, and 24 matches since their last defeat.
